ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment)); var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result), $1 = key => String(J.select('[property="og:' +key+ '"]') .attr("content")), $2 = key => String(J.select(key).text()), $3 = key => String(J.select(key).attr("href")), $4 = key => String(J.select(key).attr("src")), url = baseUrl; l = $2("section p:eq(4) a").replace(/最新章节：/g, ""); s = $2("section p:eq(1)").replace(/[中已]/g, "").replace(/完本/, "完结"); k = ""; t = ""; count = J.select("#yuedu ul li a").length; 1 == flag; JSON.stringify({ name: $2("section h1"), author: $2("section p:eq(2)") .replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/") .replace(/\s/g, "") .replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/"), kind: s + "," + k + "," + t, latest: l + "·[" + count + "]", intro: "
" + $2("section p:eq(3)") .replace(/\\n/g, "
") .replace(/(^|[。！？!?]+[\"”」）】]?)/g, "$1
"), cover: $4(".img-box img"), url: url });
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleContent.content: if(java.get("Enable")){ opt={"headers":{"Referer":source.getKey()}} cookie.removeCookie(baseUrl) result=java.getString ("#txtbox img@data-original") result.split("\n").map(x=> ''). join("\n") }else java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".tx-box ul li"),
  data = [];
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: list[i].select("h2 a").text(),
    author: String(list[i].select("p")[0].text())
      .replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/")
      .replace(/\s/g, "")
      .replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/"),
    kind:
      String(list[i].select(".status").textNodes()).replace(/[中已\[\]]/g, "") +
      "," +
      list[i].select(".adult").text(),
    word: "",
    latest: String(list[i].select("p")[1].text()).replace(/最新章节：/g, ""),
    intro: list[i].select("p")[2].text(),
    cover: list[i].select(".img-box img").attr("src"),
    url: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
1 == flag ? JSON.stringify(data) : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
$[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements("#yuedu ul li a"),
  data = [];
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    title:
      i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
1 == flag
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
$[*]

				layout_flexBasisPercent: type2
			}
	});
push("小说🌊分类",null,1,1)
	arList=["都市激情","校园春色","乡村爱情","系统异能","家庭乱伦","穿越重生","经典武侠","同人改编","科学幻想","东方玄幻","娱乐明星","历史架空","西方魔幻","贤者小说"]
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`/novel/all?theme=${index+1}&page={{page}}
`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
			push('最新🌊上架',`/comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=1&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0

		 mrList=["韩国H漫"]

	arList.map((tag,index)=>{

		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
				});
				push('全部🌊视频',`/mv/all?page={{page}}`,1,1)
     push('排行榜',`/mv/rank`,1,1)
			krList=["国产视频","日本AV","H动漫","偷拍自拍","次元萝莉","国产传媒","主播福利","吃瓜爆料","无码流出","高清AV","同人热播","3D动漫"]
				krList.map((teg,ure)=>{

})

JSON.stringify(sort)

ruleSearch.author: {{source.getVariable() == 0?java.getString("a.1@text"):null}}
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if (source.getVariable() == 0) {
    java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.items-start');
}else if (source.getVariable() == 2) {
	java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.dx-video-list@li');
}else{
    java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.dx-novel-list@li@a');
}
</js>
ruleSearch.name:
<js>
if (source.getVariable() == 0) {
  java.getString(".dx-title@textNodes");
} else if (source.getVariable() == 2){
java.getString(".text-default@text");
} else {
   java.getString(".truncate.0@text");
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾'); java.getElements('.toggleVolume,ul@.cursor-pointer');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/mv/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	   book.type = 64;
    java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

var scripts = document.select("script");

var result = []; // 用于存储最终的 JSON 数据

for (var i = 0; i < scripts.size(); i++) {
    var script = scripts.get(i);
    var scriptContent = script.data();

    // 匹配 self.__next_f.push 的内容
    var regex = /self\.__next_f\.push\((.*)\)/gs; // 使用 /gs 修饰符匹配多行
    var matches = [];
    var match;

    // 遍历所有匹配结果，保留最后一个
    while ((match = regex.exec(scriptContent)) !== null) {
        matches.push(match[1]);
    }

    // 只处理最后一个匹配的内容
    if (matches.length > 0) {
        var content = matches[matches.length - 1]; // 获取最后一个匹配的内容

        // 预处理：将英文逗号（,）替换为 ",\n"
        content = content.replace(/,/g, ",\n");

        // 打印预处理后的结果
        //java.log(content);

        // 匹配 "children":"(.*)" 和 "href":"(.*)" 的正则表达式
        var childrenRegex = /.*?"children.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var hrefRegex = /.*?"href.*?":.*?"(.*)\\"/g;
        var imgRegex = /.*?"src.*?":.*?"(.*)\\/g;

        var childrenMatches = [];
        var hrefMatches = [];
        var imgMatches = [];

        // 提取匹配的内容
        while ((match = childrenRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // 过滤掉以 "$" 开头的 children 内容
            if (!match[1].startsWith("$")) {
                childrenMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = hrefRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // 只匹配以 "/comic.*" 开头的 href 内容
            if (match[1].startsWith("/comic")) {
                hrefMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }
        while ((match = imgRegex.exec(content)) !== null) {
            // 只匹配以 ".jpg" 结尾的 src 内容
            if (match[1].endsWith(".jpg")) {
                imgMatches.push(match[1]);
            }
        }

        // 从第2个 "children" 开始处理
        var startIdx = 2; // 第2个元素的索引为12
        if (childrenMatches.length > startIdx) {
            // 按每5个children分组
            for (var j = 0; j < hrefMatches.length; j++) {
                var group = {
                    name: childrenMatches[startIdx + j * 5] || "",
                    latestChapterTitle: childrenMatches[startIdx + j * 5 + 1] || "",
                    kind: childrenMatches.slice(startIdx + j * 5 + 2, startIdx + j * 5 + 5).join(", "),
                    url: hrefMatches[j] || "",
                    img: imgMatches[j] || "" // 如果没有图片，使用默认值
                };
                result.push(group);
            }
        }
    }
}

// 输出 JSON 模板
var jsonTemplate = JSON.stringify(result, null, 4);
java.log(jsonTemplate); // 或者其他方式输出

</js>
$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = JSON.parse(result).lists,
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    index: list[i].Index,
    title: 
      i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].Name}〔${date}〕` : list[i].Name,
    link: `http://sinaappxx6.q236.cn/post/readOnload,{"method": "POST","body": "bookid=${list[i].CartoonId}&chapterid=${list[i].Id}"}`,
    time: list[i].addTime,
    ImgUrl: list[i].ImgUrl
  });
};
1 == flag
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1),JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".manga-list-2 li"),
  $ = key => String(list[i].select(key).text()),
  data = [];
for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
  data.push({
    name: $(".manga-list-2-title a"),
    author: $(".book-list-info-bottom-item").replace(/[,xX&]|[图文][:：]/g, "/")
      .replace(/\/\/\/|\/\//g, "/").replace(/^[\/]/g, ""),
    kind: "",
    word: "",
    latest: $(".manga-list-2-tip a").replace(/已更新\s/, ""),
    intro: "",
    cover: String(list[i].select("img").attr("data-original")).replace(/http:/, "https:"),
    url: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
result = JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //月份 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //日 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //小时 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //分 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //秒 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //季度 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //毫秒 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};
date = new Date(new Date().getTime()).Format("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".detail-list-1 li a"),
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  data.push({
    title:
      i == list.length - 1 ? `${list[i].text()}〔${date}〕` : list[i].text(),
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  });
};
1 == flag
  ? (java.put("Enable", 1), JSON.stringify(data))
  : java.toast("\n❗未启用书源❗");
</js>
$[*]

result = title + '·' + time + '·\[' + count + '\]'

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
    bytes.forEach(a => {
      bt = a & 0xff;
      if (bt < 16) {
        stringBuffer.append("0");
      }
      stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
    });
    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)
</js>$.[*]

}</js>

<js>
//本地解密标志位
DEBUG = 0

{{source.bookSourceComment}}

// origin 
origin = source.getVariable()

// aes keys auto update
chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/)
if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) {
  cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1]))
}

// img_array
imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src)
.select(".content-img").toArray()
.map(v=>v.attr("data-r-src"))

if (DEBUG) imgs.splice(1)

imgs.toImg(null,
{headers:{origin:origin}}
	)

</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
data = JSON.parse(result).data;
JSON.stringify({
	  "name": String(decode(data.Name)),
	  "author": String(decode(data.Author)),
	  "img": String(data.Img),
	  "desc": String(decode(data.Desc)),
	  "time": String(data.LastTime),
	  "new": String(data.LastChapter),
	  "kind": String(data.CName)+","+String(data.BookStatus),
	})
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleContent.content: var DEBUG = 0 var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric ); with(javaImport){ function decode(str){ var desede = DESede("CBC","PKCS5Padding",String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),String("SK8bncVu").getBytes()); return desede.decryptStr(str) } }; function toImg(Str){return Str.map(str=>``).join("\n")} Array.prototype.toImg=function (){return toImg(this,arguments[0])} var arr = String(decode(JSON.parse(result).data.content.match(/}+(.*)/)[1])).replace(/[\[\]"]/g,"").split(","); DEBUG?arr.slice(0,1).toImg():arr.toImg()

ruleExplore.author: $.Author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);
with(javaImport){
    function decode(str){
        var key = SecretKeySpec(String("OW84U8Eerdb99rtsTXWSILDO").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv = IvParameterSpec(String("SK8bncVu").getBytes());
        var bytes = Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher = Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
var list = [];
JSON.parse(result).data.BookList.forEach(str=>{
	list.push({
		"Name":decode(str.Name),
		"Author":decode(str.Author),
		"Img":str.Img,
		"CName":decode(str.CName)+","+str.Score+"分",
		"Desc":decode(str.Desc),
		"Id":str.Id
		})
	})
JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$.*

🔍✿与❍ 标识为VIP章节
🔍源分组（源名称做过修改，比较文艺）
🌕 正版  起点晋江源，默认搜索开启
🐣 备用与发现  与此源紧挨着上面的源一般是一个源站，默认搜索关闭
🌙 正版  付费正版源
⭐ 正版  免费正版源
🌾 男频，🌾 女频  本人常用源
🎫 a-pi   APP源
🪐 绅士  十八禁源
🏷️ 论坛  一些论坛源
🐑此标识下的分组均为网文分组
💬此标识下的分组均为出版分组
🗨️此标识下的分组均为轻小说分组
🎟️此标识下的分组均为漫画分组
🎋此标识下的分组均为有声分组
🔖 其他  一些其他的源

Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1,
    "d+": this.getDate(),
    "H+": this.getHours(),
    "m+": this.getMinutes(),
    "s+": this.getSeconds()
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
};

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

var sort = [];
var push = function(title, url, type1, type2) {
    sort.push({
        title: title,
        url: url,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: type1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: type2
        }
    });
};

var typeNames = ["全部", "恋爱", "纯爱", "古风", "异能", "悬疑", "剧情", "科幻", "奇幻", "玄幻", "穿越", "冒险", "推理", "武侠", "格斗", "战争", "热血", "搞笑", "大女主", "都市", "总裁", "后宫", "日常", "韩漫", "少年", "其它"];
var types = ["all","lianai","chunai","gufeng","yineng","xuanyi","juqing","kehuan","qihuan","xuanhuan","chuanyue","mouxian","tuili","wuxia","gedou","zhanzheng","rexie","gaoxiao","danuzhu","dushi","zongcai","hougong","richang","hanman","shaonian","qita"];

typeNames.forEach(function(item, index) {
    var url = "https://cn.baozimhcn.com/api/bzmhq/amp_comic_list?type=" + types[index] + "&region=all&filter=&page={{page}}&limit=36&language=cn&__amp_source_origin=https%3A%2F%2Fcn.baozimhcn.com";

});

ruleContent.content: header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-aym.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic." var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic + chapter_domain +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

}

}
url;
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ruleContent.content: header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-aym.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic." var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic + chapter_domain +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html
